mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN Wifi=#{status} THEN 1 END) AS wifi, COUNT(CASE WHEN Bluetooth=#{status} THEN 1 END) AS bluetooth, COUNT(CASE WHEN Tethering=#{status} THEN 1 END) AS tethering, COUNT(CASE WHEN Camera=#{status} THEN 1 END) AS camera, COUNT(CASE WHEN VoiceRecord=#{status} THEN 1 END) AS voiceRecord FROM device_management;

SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN Wifi='on' THEN 1 END) + COUNT(CASE WHEN Bluetooth='on' THEN 1 END) + COUNT(CASE WHEN Tethering='on' THEN 1 END) + COUNT(CASE WHEN Camera='on' THEN 1 END) + COUNT(CASE WHEN VoiceRecord='on' THEN 1 END) FROM device_management INNER JOIN device_info ON device_management.Device_info_Id = device_info.Id INNER JOIN user_info ON device_info.User_info_employee_num = user_info.employee_num WHERE user_info.Department = #{department};

SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN Wifi=#{status} THEN 1 END) AS wifi, COUNT(CASE WHEN Bluetooth=#{status} THEN 1 END) AS bluetooth, COUNT(CASE WHEN Tethering=#{status} THEN 1 END) AS tethering, COUNT(CASE WHEN Camera=#{status} THEN 1 END) AS camera, COUNT(CASE WHEN VoiceRecord=#{status} THEN 1 END) AS voiceRecord FROM device_management INNER JOIN device_info ON device_management.Device_info_Id = device_info.Id INNER JOIN user_info ON device_info.User_info_employee_num = user_info.employee_num WHERE user_info.Department = #{department};

SELECT Count(case when type='Wifi' then 1 end) as wifi, Count(case when type='Bluetooth' then 1 end) as bluetooth, COUNT(CASE WHEN type='Tethering' then 1 END) as tethering, Count(case when type='Camera' then 1 end) as camera, Count(case when type='VoiceRecord' then 1 end) as voiceRecord FROM control_history where left(Date,10)=#{date} and history=#{controller};

select Count(case when type='Wifi' then 1 end) as wifi, Count(case when type='Bluetooth' then 1 end) as bluetooth, Count(case when type='Tethering' then 1 end) as tethering, Count(case when type='Camera' then 1 end) as camera, Count(case when type='VoiceRecord' then 1 end) as voiceRecord from control_history inner join device_info ON control_history.Device_info_Id=device_info.Id inner join user_info ON device_info.User_info_employee_num=user_info.employee_num where user_info.Department=#{dep} and left(control_history.Date,10)=#{date} and control_history.history=#{controller};
